message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product, and I think you'd really get a lot of use out of it. I'm asking for $180.  What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $120 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $160 to make this a good deal for both of us.
I'm still interested in the product, but $160 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $140, which is the maximum I'm willing to go. Can you meet me in the middle?
